Key Match Events: The benches cleared after a hard slide by Maikel Garcia on a double play in the sixth inning of the Yankees’ 3-1 series-clinching win over the Royals in Game 4 of the ALDS on Oct. 10, 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: Jazz Chisholm Jr. put himself in the crosshairs of the ALDS by saying the Royals got ‘lucky’ in their Game 2 win and insisting the Yankees would still win the series.
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm stated that he felt Maikel Garcia tried to go injure Anthony Volpe because he was being a sore loser.
Others: The incident occurred due to Garcia's hard slide into second base and taking an incidental forearm from Volpe while making the tag to finish off a double play.
